title: What in the world is water
creator_credit: Martin Defallo, George Pearson and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Water is a willing worker; shaping the land, shifting earth or rock, carrying the food by which plants survive and so supporting other forms of life. Water is also beautiful: raindrops pelting the earth, the mighty cataract of Niagara.
creator_credit_for_label: Martin Defallo, George Pearson and National Film Board of Canada
